entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `error.type` attribute value of `http.server.request.duration` metric #51620
  • Streaming Rendering Renders Poor Errors if an Exception Happens After Streaming Started #51619
  • Enhanced Navigation Silently Ignores Fetch Network Errors #51618
  • Hosting Diagnostics risk double counting of events #51617
  • Perf regression: fortunes, single_query #51614
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #51613
  • [Blazor] Accept the `blazor.web.js` startup options format in `blazor.{server|webassembly}.js` #51611
  • Add the kestrelHttpPort port ASP.NET template flag to more templates #51609
  • MetadataTypeAttribute still not supported in Blazor client side ,wasm, workaround #39938 is not working #51604
  • [Blazor] Enable Blazor apps running inside of ASP.NET Core to be trimmed and AoT compiled #51598
  • I was displaying a bunch large text files inside blazor, this's what's happened #51597
  • Perf regression: plaintext #51595
  • Navigation in Interactive Server Components is broken unless Routes are Server Interactive #51594

Closed

  • Problems configuring Kestrel in IIS #51608
  • Publish nightly builds to an LKG location #35457
    .NET 9 Planning
  • PersistComponentState inconsistent behavior #51583
  • Blazor 8 PersistentComponentState and Enhanced Navigation #51610
  • Enable Cors not working as expected #51599
  • Provide a more intelligent routing fallback for Blazor apps that only falls back if the route matches a routable component #42003
  • [Blazor] Cannot publish Release-sized apps any more #25924
    Backlog
  • Cookie based authentication in .NET 6 Core API using Identity #51556
  • Blazor: Page scroll is incorrectly reset after a page refresh #51112
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Difference in pattern matching between MVC and endpoints #51421
  • Blazor [SupplyParameterFromQuery] not usable in OnInitialized() when navigating [dotnet 8.rc2] #51398
  • Source Generator for SignalR Client #51602
  • Possibly flawed implementation around UseStaticFiles #34159
    Backlog
  • Intercepting Blazor page events. #30115
    Backlog
  • Support Razor Component endpoints for UseExceptionHandler #50287
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor - (client side) the "guid" Route Constraint forces the component execute for every single click #19008
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #51558

PullRequests

Created

  • Add info about nightly builds table, plus .deb/.rpm installers #51621
    area-infrastructure
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51616
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51612
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Add table to README with links to nightly builds #51534
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #51589
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • Use markup for documentation #51567
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • [main] Remove network.protocol.name from request duration metric #51593
    area-hosting, 9.0-preview1
  • add data-nosnippet attribute to MainLayout razor pages #51543
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update SDK to 23523.1 #51588
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Stabilize versions #51532
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Fix construction of AsParameters with default constructor #51582
    area-networking
